narrative.Overview: Simplify narrative structure by making Plan narratives use strings instead of Narrative objects, while keeping Narrative objects for item-level narratives (TodoItem, PlanItem, TodoList, Playbook) where semantic context isn't provided by structure.

items.title: Update Narrative definition and Plan narrative structure in README.md

narrative.Result: Updated Plan core spec to use 'proposal: string' and added note explaining Plan narratives use strings (key provides context) while item narratives use Narrative objects (no structural context). Updated minimal Plan examples in both TRON and JSON.

items.title: Update Extension 3 Plan narratives to use strings

narrative.Result: Updated all 13 Plan narrative fields in Extension 3 from Narrative type to string type. Changed custom from Narrative[] to string[].

items.title: Update JSON schema Plan narratives to string type

narrative.Result: Changed all Plan narrative properties from Narrative refs to string type in vcontext-core.schema.json. Updated custom from array of Narrative to array of string.

items.title: Update all Plan narrative examples to use strings

narrative.Result: Updated Appendix A2 Plan example in both TRON and JSON formats. Replaced all Narrative(title, content) calls with bare strings for all 11 narrative fields.

items.title: Update Extension 3 and 4 example Plan narratives

narrative.Result: Updated Extension 4 example Plan narratives in both TRON and JSON to use bare strings.
